edu.holycross.shot.greekutils
[Groovy] Class MilesianInteger

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.greekutils.MilesianInteger

class MilesianInteger

A class for working with numeric data in the Milesian notational system.

Method Detail

getDigitValue

static java.lang.Integer getDigitValue(int digit)
Determines Integer value for a single digit character identified by Unicode codepoint number in decimal numbers.
returns:
Integer value of this character in the Milesian notation.
throws:
Exception if digit is not the codepoint for a valid MilesianInteger digit.
Parameters:
digit - Codepoint of the character to look at.
